nodes.bodyText: @raman-bt and @gdicristofaro, I think we can hadnle closing of the ResultSet more cleanly using another try with resources.
@raman-bt and @gdicristofaro, this method is documented as executing an UPDATE/INSERT/DELETE statement. We need to acquire the exclusive (write) lock, not the shared (read) lock.

Perhaps we want to call the new methods:
executeCommand
executeQuery
?
